root.name: Alien Monster Bowling League
root.description: Alien Monster Bowling League, also known as Galactic Bowling, is a bowling game developed and published by Perpetual FX Creative for the Wii, PC and, iPhone platforms.This single- or multiplayer game lets you bowl in a wide spectrum of environments, against a host of characters and using a lot of different skills and techniques.

similar_games.game: Disney/Pixar's Monsters Inc.: Wreck Room Arcade - Bowling for Screams
